funcs module¶

funcs.add_forum_post(question_id, uname, content)¶

Adds a ForumPost object to the database after verification :param question_id: the id of the referenced ForumQuestion object :param uname: the username of the author :param content: the content of the post :return: a ForumPost object or None

funcs.add_forum_question(uname, content)¶

Adds a ForumQuesion object to the database after verification :param uname: username :param content: content :return: a ForumQuestion object (success) or None (failure)

funcs.add_user(u)¶

Add a user and its search index equivalent to the database. :param u: User object :return: void

funcs.add_user_post(uname, content)¶

Adds a UserPost object to the database after verification :param uname: the username of the author :param content: the content of the post :return: a UserPost object or None

funcs.clear_all_tables()¶

Deletes all rows from all current database tables :return: void

funcs.date_to_string(dt_obj)¶

Gets a displayable string from a DateTime object :param dt_obj: a DateTime object :return: a string that represents that date/time

funcs.delete_user(u)¶

Deletes a user and its search index equivalent from the database. :param u: User object :return: void

funcs.fst(pair)¶

Returns the first element of a 2-tuple :param pair: a 2-tuple object :return: first element of the tuple

funcs.get_all_usernames()¶

Gets all usernames from users in the database :return: a list of strings (usernames)

funcs.get_all_users()¶

Gets all users in the database :return: a list of User objects

funcs.get_following(user)¶

Get all users who are a particular user is following :param user: a User object :return: a list of User objects

funcs.get_forum_question_ids()¶

Gets the ids of all ForumQuestion objects :return: list of integers (ids)

funcs.get_forum_question_posts(forum_q)¶

Gets all thread responses to a forum question :param forum_q: A ForumQuestion object :return: A list of ForumPost objects

funcs.get_forum_questions()¶

Gets all forum questions posted on the website by all users :return: A list of ForumQuestion objects

funcs.get_general_feed(user)¶

Gets the feed of the posts of all users whom the particular user is following in reverse chronological order :param user: a User object :return: a list of UserPost objects

funcs.get_mentees()¶

Gets all the users that are mentees (in high school) :return: list of User objects

funcs.get_mentors()¶

Gets all the users that are mentors (in college) :return: list of User objects

funcs.get_search_results(filt, text)¶

Given a filter parameter and search text, returns a list of possible matches for the user search :param filt: either ‘all’, ‘mentee’, or ‘mentor’ :param text: the search text :return: a list of User objects matching (close to) the search

funcs.get_user_by_username(uname)¶

Gets a User object from its username :param uname: username (string) :return: a User object

funcs.get_user_feed(user)¶

Gets all posts by a particular user :param user: a User object :return: a list of UserPost objects

funcs.grade_level_string(grLvlCode)¶

Converts grade level encoding into a string. :param grLvlCode: Code for the grade level. :return: the converted string

funcs.id_to_forum_question(question_id)¶

Given the id of the parent forum question, returns a ForumQuestion object :param question_id: The id of the forum question (int) :return: a ForumQuestion object

funcs.is_following(follower, following)¶

Given 2 users, determines if the first is following the second :param follower: a User object :param following: a User object :return: a boolean

funcs.is_mentee(u)¶

Determines whether a User object is a mentee (based on grade) :param u: User object :return: boolean

funcs.is_mentor(u)¶

Determines whether a User object is a mentor (based on grade) :param u: User object :return: boolean

funcs.is_valid_user(u)¶

Given a user object, determines whether it is in the database :param u: a User object :return: a boolean

funcs.sorted_reverse_id_order(l)¶

Sorts a list of objects with ‘id’ attributes in reverse order :param l: list of identified objects :return: sorted list

funcs.state_abbrev_to_name(abbrev)¶

Converts a state abbreviation string into the state name :param abbrev: state abbreviation :return: state name

funcs.valid_post_params(uname, content)¶

Verifies author_username and content data :param uname: username (string) :param content: text :return: boolean
